reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress flattering with a slimming effect, and one mentions it makes their waist look super snatched.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress for warm weather.
items.body: This is a gorgeous, eye catching dress in black and white - still wonder if I should have gotten the blue. It fits well, true to size and I love how it hides your lumps and bumps. Very attractive and comfortable. However, I‚Äôm only 5‚Äô3‚Äù, so it‚Äôs a little long on me and I no longer wear high heels due to balance issues. It would be great if I didn‚Äôt need heels, so I think I‚Äôll have it altered. But the dress is worth it. Perfect for summer. It seems well made -substantial in weight but light enough for summer. I feel this is a good value. Read more
items.author: C. Davis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Versatile, and Great Quality
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! The fit is perfect, and I really appreciate that the straps are adjustable. At 5'2", the length hits right at my ankles, which is ideal. The quality is excellent, and it‚Äôs so comfortable to wear. What I love most is its versatility‚Äîyou can easily dress it up or down. On colder days, I‚Äôve layered it with a long-sleeve underneath or thrown a cardigan over my shoulders, and it still looks chic. Even worn on its own, it creates an effortlessly elevated everyday look. Read more
items.author: Sultana B.K.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant & Flattering, But a Bit Too Formal for Everyday
items.body: This PRETTYGARDEN spaghetti strap backless maxi dress is really cute and very flattering‚Äîit fits like a glove! I got the black and white version and while the top is a soft cotton material that fits great over the girls (a little low cut, but still tasteful), the skirt is very full with a lot of fabric. Personally, I found it to be a little too dressy for casual wear like lunch, brunch, or running errands. But it‚Äôs absolutely perfect for a more formal event‚Äîthink summer weddings, garden parties, or any occasion where you want to look feminine and put together. If you're looking for a flowy, elegant dress that makes a statement, this one‚Äôs a great pick. Just be prepared for the fullness of the skirt‚Äîit‚Äôs more of a standout piece than an everyday go-to. Read more
items.author: Emely

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great dress especially for the price!
items.body: Very impressed with this dress. Not only is it very pretty. I got lots of compliments, but it's comfortable. It's a great weight. Can dress up or down! It's beautiful and would definitely, recommend and would definitely buy again. Read more
items.author: Barri Appet

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful! üòç
items.body: Soft fabric, a little thicker than expected but very nice. Super flattering fit. I add a denim jacket for work since it‚Äôs spaghetti straps. Love that it has pockets too. Compliments every time I wear it. All around great piece! Read more
items.author: Melissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Love this dress & fits great! Read more
items.author: Adina Richards

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is absolutely stunning!
items.body: This dress is absolutely stunning! The black-and-white color blocking creates such a chic, timeless look that flatters every figure. The flowing maxi length gives it an elegant yet effortless vibe perfect for both daytime outings and evening events. I love how comfortable the fabric feels while still looking sophisticated. It‚Äôs the kind of piece that makes you stand out without even trying. Pair it with a bold handbag or statement jewelry, and you‚Äôve got an outfit that turns heads everywhere! Read more
items.author: Georgiak

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful style but poor quality
items.body: Beautiful dress but the stitching on the hem is awful. White thread on all the black panels. So disappointed. There should be a picture, or something in the description, explaining that‚Äôs how it‚Äôs sewn. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Benson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue White, Wine Red White, Green White, Coffe White, Amy Green White, Black White, Red White, Navy White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
